name: 陳清祺
objective: The goal of this course is to improve the reading and writing ability of graduate student. The contents include general formats of sentences, vocabularies, reading skill, and infrastructure of English report and academic papers.
scorePolicy:
Regular grades: 40% (including attendance, writing exercises, reports, etc.)
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials:
1. Technical writing: a practical approach, William S. Pfeiffer, Prentice Hall
2. A shortcut to mastering scientific and technological paper writing, Ke Taide, Yang Zhi
3. A brief talk on English writing, Wu Bingzhong
consultation: 1. Please email to newmanch@ntut.edu.tw2. Please go to Room 609 of the Science Building for inquiries (please make an appointment in advance!)3. Laboratory extension: 3527
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）● 使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）● 簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）
